name: Hidden Styles Remover
description:
Remove any hidden fills, strokes, and effects from your pages. Keep your Figma files clean.


Automatically removes any hidden styles from frames, components, text layers, rectangles, vectors, and other shapes.


Run the plugin on any pages you want to clean up, one page at a time. Itâ€™ll scan all elements on that page and remove any hidden fills, strokes, and effects.
